Uses of Class
org.hibernate.engine.FilterDefinition

Packages that use FilterDefinition
org.hibernate This package defines the central Hibernate APIs. 
org.hibernate.cfg This package defines APIs for configuring Hibernate, and classes for building the Hibernate configuration-time metamodel. 
org.hibernate.impl This package contains implementations of the central Hibernate APIs, especially the Hibernate session. 
org.hibernate.jmx This package exposes a Hibernate instance via JMX. 
 

Uses of FilterDefinition in org.hibernate
 

Methods in org.hibernate that return FilterDefinition
 FilterDefinition SessionFactory.getFilterDefinition(String filterName)
          Obtain the definition of a filter by name.
 FilterDefinition Filter.getFilterDefinition()
          Get the filter definition containing additional information about the filter (such as default-condition and expected parameter names/types).
